item.title: Scratchpad
item.description: Hugo JS and HTML interaction Hugo directory structure Note that when you are using shortcode, and that shortcode uses a JSscript sitting the the static page Makesure you import that JS script as an absolute path <script src="/js/file1.js" type="text/javascript"></script> <script src="/js/file2.js" type="text/javascript"></script> the reason being, hugo takes everyhing in the static folder and throw it into the baseurl of the site Breaking python script halfway to run enter into pdb with kill signal using signal using ctrl+c which produces a SIGINT
